item.title: CMCSA
item.description: score:-21 Chances: Comcast expands Xfinity 10G Network, boosting connectivity. Comcast RISE initiative supports small businesses with grant packages. Comcast completes broadband expansion, enhancing services to towns. Participation in industry events like Essence Festival and film festivals. Comcast partners with libraries to boost Wi-Fi and connectivity.
